Original article Use near-black and near-white instead of pure black and white Saturate your neutrals If nothing else, add just a hint of color to your near-black and near-white.

The molecule ethanol is what makes you feel drunk. It does this by binding to receptors in your brain. Most notably ethanol binds to glutamate neurotransmitters, which in turn causes the brain to respond slower to stimuli.
